name: Add a new row in Google Sheets when a Pipefy card is moved
description: Streamline your project management workflow by automatically logging card movements in Pipefy to Google Sheets. Every time a card is moved within Pipefy, this template will create a new row in your designated Google Sheets document, allowing you to easily track progress and maintain an organized record of your project activities. This integration ensures that you never miss a detail and can focus on what truly mattersâ€”driving your projects to success.
